import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import './Main.css' // import main1img from '../Utilities/logo.jpg' function Main() { // const [buttonPopup, setButtonPopup] = useEffect(false); $('#exampleModal').on('show.bs.modal', function (event) { var button = $(event.relatedTarget) // Button that triggered the modal var recipient = button.data('whatever') // Extract info from data-* attributes // If necessary, you could initiate an AJAX request here (and then do the updating in a callback). // Update the modal's content. We'll use jQuery here, but you could use a data binding library or other methods instead. var modal = $(this) modal.find('.modal-title').text('New message to ' + recipient) modal.find('.modal-body input').val(recipient) }) return (

Welcome to Urban resolve...

let's make our city more livable by reporting all the issues...

New message

Check the AQI of your city

News related to pollution and clean energy

Insights into preserving the planet by reducing carbon footprint

) } export default Main;
